original_text: He began to speak boldly in the synagogue, but when Priscilla and Aquila heard him, they took him aside and explained to him the way of God more accurately.
korean_text: 그가 회당에서 담대히 말하기 시작하거늘 브리스길라와 아굴라가 듣고 데려다가 하나님의 도를 더 정확하게 풀어 이르더라

sentences.original_text: He began to speak boldly in the synagogue
but when Priscilla and Aquila heard him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 브리스킬라와 아굴라가 그의 말을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: and explained to him the way of God more accurately.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 길을 더 정확하게 그에게 설명해 주었습니다.
